archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0805
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Direct Cost Specialist - Retail billing - We want siebel revenue invoices (download format) in order to manually bill our IOT customers Source Siebel billing generated PDF invoice automactically saved online (Bill Image Search)

properties.value: To be discussed. What is siebel role in DX? KH: Moved to Horizon 2

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
